New Records: Juan Soto hit the biggest home run of his life, with the weight of 15 pennantless years, with free agency looming
Key Match Events: Giancarlo Stanton hit a game-tying home run in the 6th inning
Juan Soto hit a walk-off home run in the 10th inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees made a high-risk decision to empty out a huge chunk of their pitching depth last December
The decision paid off with the Yankees going to the World Series
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees are AL champions for the 41st time in franchise history
The team will wait to see how the National League shakes out to determine their opponent in the Fall Classic
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees will face their old Brooklyn rivals on the West Coast on Friday night for their first Fall Classic showdown with LA since 1981
